scripts.build-css: sass sass/styles.scss:wwwroot/css/styles.css sass/reviews.scss:wwwroot/css/reviews.css sass/reviewEdit.scss:wwwroot/css/reviewEdit.css sass/login.scss:wwwroot/css/login.css sass/home.scss:wwwroot/css/home.css sass/courses.scss:wwwroot/css/courses.css sass/privacy.scss:wwwroot/css/privacy.css sass/reservation.scss:wwwroot/css/reservation.css sass/reservationConfirm.scss:wwwroot/css/reservationConfirm.css
scripts.watch-css: sass --watch sass/styles.scss:wwwroot/css/styles.css sass/reviews.scss:wwwroot/css/reviews.css sass/reviewEdit.scss:wwwroot/css/reviewEdit.css sass/login.scss:wwwroot/css/login.css sass/home.scss:wwwroot/css/home.css sass/courses.scss:wwwroot/css/courses.css sass/privacy.scss:wwwroot/css/privacy.css sass/reservation.scss:wwwroot/css/reservation.css sass/reservationConfirm.scss:wwwroot/css/reservationConfirm.css
scripts.js-minify: npx terser wwwroot/js/script.js --compress --mangle --output wwwroot/js/script.min.js && npx terser wwwroot/js/courses.js --compress --mangle --output wwwroot/js/courses.min.js && npx terser wwwroot/js/home.js --compress --mangle --output wwwroot/js/home.min.js && npx terser wwwroot/js/reviews.js --compress --mangle --output wwwroot/js/reviews.min.js && npx terser wwwroot/js/reservation.js --compress --mangle --output wwwroot/js/reservation.min.js
scripts.css-minify: npx clean-css-cli wwwroot/css/reviews.css --output wwwroot/css/reviews.min.css && npx clean-css-cli wwwroot/css/styles.css --output wwwroot/css/styles.min.css && npx clean-css-cli wwwroot/css/courses.css --output wwwroot/css/courses.min.css && npx clean-css-cli wwwroot/css/fonts.css --output wwwroot/css/fonts.min.css && npx clean-css-cli wwwroot/css/home.css --output wwwroot/css/home.min.css && npx clean-css-cli wwwroot/css/login.css --output wwwroot/css/login.min.css && npx clean-css-cli wwwroot/css/privacy.css --output wwwroot/css/privacy.min.css && npx clean-css-cli wwwroot/css/reservation.css --output wwwroot/css/reservation.min.css && npx clean-css-cli wwwroot/css/reservationConfirm.css --output wwwroot/css/reservationConfirm.min.css && npx clean-css-cli wwwroot/css/reviewEdit.css --output wwwroot/css/reviewEdit.min.css
